name: Format\Aside
description: The component for setting apart content that is not directly related to the article, such as promotional content.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of ComponentLink objects. This can be used to create a , allowing a link to anywhere in News. Adding a link to an aside component will make the entire component interactable. Any links used in its child components are not  interactable.

properties.name: allowAutoplacedAds
properties.description: A Boolean value that allows the placement of ad banners between components. Nested components inherit the value of the outermost container that explicitly sets allowAutoplacedAds. The default value is false.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description:
An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description:
An object that defines behavior for a component, like  or .
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

properties.name: components
properties.description: An array of components to display as child components. Child components are positioned and rendered relative to their parent component.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An instance or array of container properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: contentDisplay
properties.description:
An object that defines how to position child components within this aside component. A , for example, allows for displaying child components side by side.
In versions of News prior to iOS 11, child components are positioned as if contentDisplay were not defined.
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: An optional unique identifier for this component. If used, this identifier must be unique across the entire document. You will need an identifier for your component if you want to anchor other components to it.

properties.name: layout
properties.description:
An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document. 
If layout is not defined, size and position are based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

properties.name: style
properties.description:
An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.
